author: Kif Leswing
title: Data from 68,000 fitness trackers show Americans are moving less and sleeping more under quarantine
description: Large portions of the United States are under orders to stay home or self-quarantine to slow the outbreak of the COVID-19 coronavirus. A new study found people are moving less and sleeping more.
content: While Americans are home, under orders to stay indoors or self-quarantine to slow the outbreak of the COVID-19 coronavirus, they're moving less and sleeping more, according to a new study using data from over 68,000 fitness trackers. The research included App… [+2602 chars]
